## useTheme() function

Use current theme.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useTheme(options?: UseThemeOptions): UseThemeResult;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [UseThemeOptions](./hooks.usethemeoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Options to customize theme. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[UseThemeResult](./hooks.usethemeresult.md)
